meanings.definition: A man who wears a gown, especially in an academic or legal setting.
meanings.sent1: The gownsmen at the graduation ceremony looked dignified in their academic robes.
meanings.sent2: The gownsmen gathered in the library for the academic conference.
meanings.sent3: The gownsmen accidentally swapped their academic gowns and had a good laugh.
meanings.sent4: The group of gownsmen stood out like distinguished scholars in their academic attire.
meanings.sent5: The image of the gownsmen in their academic gowns was etched in his memory.

meanings.definition: Members of a university or college who wear academic gowns.
meanings.sent1: The gownsmen from different colleges mingled at the academic event.
meanings.sent2: The gownsmen proudly represented their university at the academic competition.
meanings.sent3: The gownsmen organized a fun academic quiz night for charity.
meanings.sent4: The unity among the gownsmen from various universities was inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The academic success of the gownsmen was celebrated by the entire campus.
